Name: Wandering Owl
About the game: The Hawk - one of the most dangerous noontime predator, but under the cover of the night, even he runs away, scared, when he sees the Owl. One wonderful (or horrible) day, storm separated Owlet with his nest, and now because of that he had to face his worst nightmares. Can you find a new home to little Owlet, or are you going to seal his fate with the first rays of the sun? Everything depends on you. Planned features Trading Cards Current features 9 levels filled with dangerous obstacles. Take away all fragile stuff. Creators are not responsible for broken goods. The game has it's own atmosphere, which could be your cup of tea. Controls are pretty simple! Each level we made with love and cruelty. Our game has a death counter which will remind you of your past failures. It also can spur you on, when it especially needed. Steam Achivements This game is our first creation, and we are going to be so glad to hear your feedback. We need you to improve our development! Thanks for choosing us.
